occupation: Senior Director, Edge Computing & Managed Network Security Enterprise Sales
headline: Senior Director, Edge Computing & Managed Network Security Enterprise Sales
summary: Experienced Regional Director with a demonstrated history of working in the computer and network security industry. Skilled in Cloud Security, Firewalls, Managed Services, Enterprise Software, and Business Development. Strong sales professional with a Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) focused in Management Information Systems from Baylor University.

recommendations:
Landy Compton



If you're in search of a true professional who consistently delivers exceptional results, I recommend Johnny. Johnny isn't just a professional; he's a dedicated advocate for your success.
